# `tdf`

Installation 
---

To install the development version of the package, use
```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("alastairrushworth/tdf")
```

Usage
---

Load the package and type `winners` to see the data

```{r}
library(tdf)
head(winners[1:10,])
```
